subject: Attention,Beneficiary
body:
Attention,Beneficiary
Welcome to the USA FBI Headquarters in Washington DC, This is to
inform you that we stop Diplomat Jerry Richard who came to US from the
Benin Republic with consignment box worth $2,700.000.00 as your funds
compensation on Dec 20th 2023 because the diplomat did not explain or
answered the question we asked him concerning the funds on the
consignment,
Finally, After the investigation we found out that funds worth
$2,700,000.00 on the consignment box belongs to you as the right owner
to receive the funds,
Today Being Tuesday 23/2024 we have finally concluded to deliver the
consignment box to you which
 will cost you only $45.00 for the US FBI
security keeping fee and any other fees will be paid after the
delivery at your home address,
Kindly send your current home address and also send the $45 through
Itune card or Steam wallet for the security keeping fee only,
Note,Your consignment box will be delivered to you from the US FBI
delivery agent Mr Emmanuel Ken,
Here is delivery agent detail.
US FBI delivery agent Mr Emmanuel Ken,
Tel: +1 715-257-5575
You advised to reply immediately once you received this
email:usafbi001newyork@gmail.com
Regards
US FBI AGENT

subject: Re: Attention,Beneficiary
body:
Dear US FBI Agent,

Thank you for your message. I am surprised to hear about this situation as I was not expecting any funds from Benin Republic. 

Before proceeding, could you please provide more details about the origin of these funds and why they are being sent to me? Also, could you clarify why the payment for the security keeping fee is requested in Itune card or Steam wallet? This seems unusual for an official transaction.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Barbara
